description.value:
Requirement You are under the effect of a meditation spell.

You perform the following as you Sustain your Meditation.

You lash arcane power to corrode the weave of your target, stripping their physical resistance. Creatures who fail the @Check[reflex|against:class-spell] suffer a -1 status penalty to Fortitude saves for 2 rounds (1 round on success, -2 status penalty on critical failure). This is an Arcane and Curse effect.
